items.description:
Each element in this array contains a representation of the maneuvers available to the ship at a particular speed, determined its position in the array. ei. ship.maneuvers[1] will provide all maneuvers available to said ship at speed 1.
This array may be a short as required to provide accurate data, meaning that a missing speed 'index' indicates that the ship is is not capable of such speed.

This array is a representation of a ship' maneuvers at a particular speed.

Each value on this array references a different maneuver depending on its index, which maps according to the following list:
	0 = Left Turn
	1 = Left Bank
	2 = Straight
	3 = Right Bank
	4 = Right Turn
	5 = Koiogran Turn
	6 = Segnor's Loop Left
	7 = Segnor's Loop Left
	8 = Tallon Roll Left
	9 = Tallon Roll Right

Possible values in this array range from 0 to 3 and mean the following:
	0 = Maneuver unavailable
	1 = White maneuver
	2 = Green maneuver
	3 = Red maneuver

This array may be a short as required to provide accurate data, meaning that a missing value for a particular maneuver type indicates that said maneuver is not available to that particular ship at that particular speed.
